content.rendered:
STEDI T20 Wedge LED Light Conversion Globe in Dual Filament which has full brightness / dim function and compatible with both 7440 & 7443 fittings.

PURE WHITE 5700K

Our T20’s use a 5700k temperature for a whiter/modern look that will have an increased performance over the factory halogen bulbs. Our STEDI Copperheads headlight conversions also run 5700k which combined will bring your vehicles front end out of the dark ages and into 2018.

BRIGHTER 

With a low amp rating of just 0.2a @ 13.6v the brightness increase over a standard halogen with lower power consumption is reason enough in itself to make the move to upgrade to LED.

APPLICATION

Mostly suited to parkers and brake/reverse lights and DRLs, the T20’s can also be found in specific vehicles interior map/dome light. For a helpful guide explaining the types of connectors and fittings, head over to our interior LED conversion guide in our blog.

DETAILS

T20 7443 W21/5W Wedge LED Light Dual Filament Parker You’ve upgraded your headlights to LED now you’re looking at your parkers in all their awful amber glory. Our T20 wedge LED are the finishing touch to bring the front end of your car back into the 20th century.

KEY TECHNICAL FEATURES | T20

  • CANBUS friendly – Error-free operation
  • Constant Current circuit – Avoids compromising LED life & provides consistent illumination across all LEDs
  • Compatible from 9v to 30v circuits.
  • 66SMD LED for uniform light distribution

COMMON USES FOR 7443 / 7440 BULBS

  • Parker Lights
  • Brake Light / Tail Lights
  • Indicator Lights
  • DRLs
  • Reverse Lights

Sold in packs of 2

Compatible with 7440 and 7443 W21/5W Wedge LED Light Dual and Single Filament.

Direct replacement for the following W21/5W / 3057 / 3157 / 3457 / 4057 / 4114 /. 4157 / P27/7W W21W

SPECIFICATIONS

HOUSING MATERIAL Aluminium
LED 3030
LUMINOUS FLUX (ON HIGH) 609 Lumens
LUMINOUS FLUX (ON LOW) 120 Lumens
POWER 0.2a @ 13.6v
COMPATIBLE VOLTAGE DC 12v and 24v
LIFESPAN 30,000 Hours
CANBUS Built-In
CONNECTOR TYPE T20 7443 & 7440
INGRESS PROTECTION IP65
OPERATING TEMP -40°c to + 80°c
CERTIFICATION CE, ROHS
RENDERING INDEX 83 CRI

 

 

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 2 x STEDI T20 Wedge LED Lights

excerpt.rendered: Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
